title: Business & Finance
text:
Shrinking apartment sales and an unexpected default stoked fresh investor concerns about China's property developers, causing a steep selloff in U.S.-dollar bonds from many of the sector's debt-laden companies.

---

GM told investors it aims to more than double revenue by 2030 with an influx of new battery-electric models and auto-related services.

---

IAC reached a roughly $2.7 billion deal to buy magazine publisher Meredith, in a bet on online publishing.

---

U.S. stocks rose, erasing early losses, with the S&P 500, Dow and Nasdaq gaining 0.4%, 0.3% and 0.5%, respectively.

---

Twitch, the online videogame streaming platform owned by Amazon , said it suffered a data breach, with information leaked on the online chat forum 4chan.

---

Putin said Moscow was ready to work on stabilizing the energy market, causing a sudden reversal in natural-gas prices, which had earlier soared to record levels.

---

Boeing 's Starliner won't get to attempt launch again this year, NASA officials said, and two astronauts who were meant to fly on it were reassigned to a future mission using a SpaceX ship.
